trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event occurs when code executing by way of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> throws an exception which is not handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>发生事件时通过执行代码时<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>引发未经处理的异常。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event provides a means to not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>事件提供了一种方法不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event is raised first, and If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> on the DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>首先，将引发事件; 如果<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A>在 DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs 设为`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>不会引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that was raised when executing code by way of the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 获取执行通过调度程序的代码时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the exception should be caught and the event handlers called.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否应捕捉到异常，并且调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event provides a means to not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>事件提供了一种方法不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> is raised first, and If RequestCatch on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>位于引发第一个，并且如果 RequestCatch<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs>设置为`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>不会引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: A previous handler in the event multicast might have already set this property to `false`, indicating that the exception will not be caught.
trans-unit.target: 在事件多路广播上一个处理程序可能具有已将设置此属性为`false`，指明不会捕获异常。

trans-unit.source: The "don't catch" behavior will override all others because it most likely means a debugging scenario.
trans-unit.target: "不要捕捉"行为将覆盖所有其他用户，因为它最有可能表示一个调试方案。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException"></xref> should be raised; otherwise; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException"></xref>引发; 否则为; 应为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
